summary: Diff adds a MobileInHandIcon component and updates the global theme tokens in index.css to a darker Chewy-like blue. PawfectCareLanding.tsx shows new imports consistent with adding an FAQ accordion and a convenient-access section, but the landing page file is truncated, so several content- and image-specific requirements cannot be fully verified from the provided diff excerpt alone.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated HTML meta tags and document title for the landing page
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not request changes to index.html metadata/title; it focused on landing page sections, theme tokens, images, and end-of-page FAQ/Need Help content.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions: "frontend/index.html": "HTML entry point with updated meta tags and title...")

hallucinated_features.description: Tailwind configuration changes (extended theme, border radius default, system font stack)
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only required applying color changes via existing theme tokens (index.css + Tailwind token usage) and did not explicitly request tailwind.config.js theme extensions beyond that.
